description: This file defines authentication-related routes for user registration and login, utilizing Express.js framework, including request validation, database interaction, password hashing, JWT signing, and audit logging.

methods.name: router.post('/register')
methods.description: Handles user registration by validating input, hashing password, inserting user into database, and logging the action.

methods.name: router.post('/login')
methods.description: Handles user login by validating input, verifying credentials, generating a JWT token, and logging the login event.
